name: Messianic Lord Blaster
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have six units with "Blaster" in their different card names, this unit gets the original [Power] and [Critical] of all of your rear-guards.
[AUTO](VC):When your drive check reveals a card with "Blaster" in its card name, you may call that card to an open (RC).
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Dragonic Overlord the Great
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, call up to one "Dragonic Neoflame" from your drop zone to (RC).
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that it attacked, if your soul has a grade 3, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard two cards from your hand], [Stand] this unit and one of your "Dragonic Neoflame", and they get drive -1 until end of turn.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Beast Deity, Azure Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, call a card from your hand to (RC), and attack your opponent's vanguard with that unit. If that attack did not hit, at the end of that battle, [Stand] that unit.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] one of your rear-guards.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Wandering Starhulk Deity, Brandt Ringer
effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of your opponent's turn, for your opponent's trigger effects, other than the [Power] increase, change the effects to "[Critical]:Your vanguard gets [Critical] -1 until end of that battle.", "[Heal]:Deal one damage to your vanguard.", and "[Draw]:Discard a card from your hand.", and change the [Power] increase of [Front] triggers to the back row.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Arc Saver Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC)/Hand:If you have a total of three or more cards with "Blaster" in their different card names on your (VC) and drop zone, this card gets grade -1.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 3 & Soul-Blast 3], search for up to one card with "Blaster" in its card name each from your deck, drop zone, soul, and damage zone, to a total of three or less cards, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Dragon Full-armored Buster
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):If your opponent has no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +3000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card with "Overlord" in its card name from among them, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Sabel Dragonewt
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When its attack hits, draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, [COST][retire this unit], and draw a card.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Clay-doll Mechanic
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if you have a total of four or less cards in your hand and rear-guards, draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When you [Counter-Blast], [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Wandering Starhulk Ruler, Brandt
effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and until end of your opponent's turn, for your opponent's trigger effects, other than the [Power] increase, change the effects to "[Critical]:Your vanguard gets [Critical] -1 until end of that battle." and "[Heal]:Deal one damage to your vanguard.".
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Whiteouter, Vect
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that it attacked a vanguard, if your opponent did not call trigger units during that battle, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], you draw a card, choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and bind it face down.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Blaster Arrow
effect:
[CONT](RC):If you have six units with "Blaster" in their different card names, they cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if you have three or more units with "Blaster" in their different card names, [COST][discard a card from your hand], search your deck for up to one "Arc Saver Dragon", reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Blaster Rapier
effect:
[CONT](RC):If you have six units with "Blaster" in their different card names, this unit gets [Power] +15000.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" or "Arc Saver" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Blaster Javelin
effect:
[CONT](RC):During the battle that it boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" or "Arc Saver" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
[AUTO](RC):When it boosts, if you have six units with "Blaster" in their different card names, choose a rear-guard in your opponent's front row, and bind it.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Blaster Dagger
effect:
[CONT](RC):If you have six units with "Blaster" in their different card names, they get "Boost".
[AUTO](RC):When the attack of your vanguard with "Blaster" or "Arc Saver" in its card name hits a vanguard, you may return this unit to your hand.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Dragonic Neoflame
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your "Dragonic Overlord the Great" attacks, until end of that battle, that unit gets [Power] +5000, then, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and that unit gets [Critical] +1.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Incise Raizer
effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] all of the rear-guards on your additional (RC).
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Brutal Jack
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
[CONT](RC):This unit cannot [Stand] during the stand phase.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][[Rest] two rear-guards], and [Stand] this unit.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Starhulk, Letaluk
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a card with "Starhulk" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO]:When it intercepts, if you have a vanguard with "Starhulk" in its card name, look at the top card of your opponent's deck. You may bind that card.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Taintless Feather Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a column, call up to two cards from your hand to that column's (RC), and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you called two cards, draw a card.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Rotary Sage, Belk
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):All of your "Undulatory Sage, Tarna" on your (RC) and (GC) get [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Undulatory Sage, Tarna
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):All of your "Rotary Sage, Belk" on your (RC) and (GC) get [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Fire Rage Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck into the drop zone, choose the same number of your opponent's rear-guards as the grade of that card, retire them, and if you did not retire any units, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Dragonic Burnout
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a grade 2 or greater card from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Meganton Powerdon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit in [Rest] is retired from (RC), return a <Hero> from your drop zone to your hand. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

name: Beast Deity, Black Tortoise
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and attack your opponent's vanguard with it. If that attack did not hit, at the end of that battle, [Stand] this unit.

name: Beast Deity, Scarlet Bird
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed during your main phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] all of your units. If you [Stand] two or more units, and if "Beast Deity, White Tiger" is in your soul, draw a card.
productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

effect:

productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction

productName: [V-EB06] Light of Salvation, Logic of Destruction
